sent.orig: South Pacific Nuclear Free Zone Treaty (Treaty of Rarotonga)
sent.trans: 南太平洋无核区条约（拉罗通加条约）

sent.orig: Feature-Military treaty: The military contract treaty now has the suitable name of 'garrison right'
sent.trans: 军事条约改成比较恰当的名字－‘驻军权’

sent.orig: Treaty relating to the Navigation of the Black Sea and Danube (Treaty of London)
sent.trans: 黑海和多瑙河航行条约（伦敦条约）

sent.orig: The Program is fully protected by copyright under U.S. law and international treaty provisions.
sent.trans: 这个程序由美国版权和国际供应条约完全保护。

sent.orig: Our treaty makers approached their immensely difficult problems unprepared.
sent.trans: 我们的谈判人员遇到一些毫无准备的极难处理的问题。
